Text: RE TGLO Status Cc Cost centers and are rolling to Texas Gas Trading Original Message From Coffey Jr Jim Sent Tuesday October AM To Parker Megan Boyt Eric Farmer Daren J Cc Bryan Gary Pond Jim Helton Susan East Laynie Roberts Linda Subject RE TGLO Status Megan As I mentioned to you yesterday it still looks like the volumes for gas delivered to TX GLO do not have Linda Roberts origination fee deducted Do we need to execute a PMA with TXGLO to deduct those volumes from the next delievery Also isnt there an entry that is missing in your file to capture the cost of gas for the gas delivered to TXGLO Is that being captured in Unify or is it being manually entered by Gas Accounting Darren Do we need to execute a seperate deal ticket for the origination deduct SusanLaynie What busines unit are these cost centers rolling up to File TGLO GL Account Detailxls Original Message From Parker Megan Sent Tuesday October AM To Boyt Eric Cc Newman Frank G Coffey Jr Jim Subject TGLO Status Eric I reviewed the gas deals on Franks spreadsheet and they agree with what is in Sitara As soon as I have the October gas numbers I will forward them to you Attached is a spreadsheet of the TGLO deals booked to the GL to help you with our current settlement position It is divided by debitcredit entries When the sales are booked a debit hits the customer account to create the open sale to apply the cash to and a credit hits the revenue account third party intercompany for the profit center Below is a summary of where we are on the sale dollars to EGM I have already sent an email to risk to update the demand fees for the prior months and to book Aug and Sept crude I will wait for the go ahead from Frank before I final them to the GL Let me know if you have any questions Megan Status of Sales to EGM Cleared invoices Open Invoices To be booked File TGLO GL Account Detailxls

Revised Texas Trading Business PlanPST Tom Laura said you just left sorry I missed you Please see the attached schedule for the reductions I made to Employee Expense Outside Services and Rent If you have a problem with any of these or want to discuss further give me a call tomorrow Laynie x

Texas Trading Plan PREBANKRUPTCY Cc PST Tom Here is the plan we worked on prior to the bankruptcy filing Also the two logistics employees you mentioned are included with Bob Hall on the file David sent you earlier Laynie x

FW Request per Tom MartinTom I meant to include you on my reply below but I sent it to Martin Thomas instead Original Message From East Laynie Sent Thursday October AM To Vuittonet Laura Cc Thomas Martin Subject RE Request per Tom Martin Laura The allocated costs are determined by other groups but so far we havent gotten much planning information for We did get information for Outside Legal but that was just what had been allocated in as of August I did include an estimate for this by considering what was planned for in and what actuals were No information has been provided for the other allocated costs In some cases such as System Development the amount planned for in was quite large so I went ahead and included that same plan number for until we can get better information I dont have any detail to give you as of now but Ill pass along anything I receive Laynie x Original Message From Vuittonet Laura Sent Wednesday October PM To East Laynie Subject Request per Tom Martin Hi Laynie Tom sent me an email asking for a detail of our budgeted allocated costs can you please help These are his exact words Also Louise mentioned in the staff meeting that we are going to be more directly accountable and able to control our allocated costs such as IT and logistics costs next year Please ask Laynie to give a detail of our budgeted allocated costs such as IT logistics etc for next so that we can review it Please let me know if there is anything I can do to assist you with this somehow Thanks Laura x

East Gas Business PlanPST The attached file has been updated with the changes we discussed I also added a Cost per Employee column for the relevant line items Let me know if you need anything else Laynie x

Adjusted Business Plan EastPST FrankScott I redistributed the dollar amounts among the line items in the Adjusted Plan column but I left the totals the same Please let me know if you agree with these changes Thanks Laynie x

RE ActualsBarry I will have September actuals ready on Wednesday Let me know if you want to meet then to discuss Also Louise has reviewed the headcount plan submitted for and asked that we reduce the West Origination count by one The attached file shows what was initially submitted If you will let me know what position to eliminate I will make the necessary adjustments Thanks Laynie x Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Monday October AM To East Laynie Subject Actuals What is the latest actuals that I have for month to date West Gas orig and West Gas Denver orig BT

RE ActualsBarry Im not in the office today logging in from home but will be in tomorrow Im free all day so let me know what time is best for you Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Mon AM To East Laynie Cc Subject Actuals Lets try to get together today BT
Hot List UpdatesIf you have any changes for the hot list for this week please let me now by pm tomorrow Thursday Thanks Laynie x

Direct Expense Plan PRELIMINARYBarryMark Please see the attached files for the direct expense plan The goal was to reach a combined plan of about The numbers included only add up to about so we can discuss if and where to add the additional Ill try to reach you both at Marks number around Denver time Houston time tomorrow morning Laynie

Direct Expense PlanBarry For your cost center I increased travel by k and Conferences Training by I didnt make any other changes to Marks These two files show the detail This file shows the combined plan for West Origination The Income Statement tab is what will be presented to Office of the Chair Let me know if you need anything else Thanks Laynie x

Re ESchedule Responsibilities Here are the eschedules I prepared for Canada Dana Please print three copies for Keith Co C ELIST E E C L ELIST E E Please let me know if you have any questions or need any other information Thanks Laynie Marnie NRON PM To Laynie CT cc Subject Re ESchedule Responsibilities Yes please have someone there review Can you email them to me when you are done Thanks Marnie From Laynie East ECT AM To Marnie NRON cc Subject Re ESchedule Responsibilities Marnie How do you want to handle the review of companies C and L since Im not in the Houston office If you would like I can get someone here to review them Laynie Marnie NRON AM To Susan nron Kevin CT Brian nron Laynie CT Lisa CT Lisa nron Rosalyn nron Stacy NRON Tammy CT cc Subject ESchedule Responsibilities Hi All Attached is the Q ESchedule Responsibility List There have been a few changes from Q due to new companies and staffing changes so please review the attached list carefully If you have any questions or concerns please let me know As a reminder please have these completed schedules to me by Friday morning Obviously the earlier I get them the better off I am so if you can get them to me earlier than that I would appreciate it Thanks Marnie

Re ESchedule Responsibilities Here are the eschedules I prepared for Canada Dana Please print three copies for Keith Co C ELIST E E C L ELIST E E Please let me know if you have any questions or need any other information Thanks Laynie Marnie NRON PM To Laynie CT cc Subject Re ESchedule Responsibilities Yes please have someone there review Can you email them to me when you are done Thanks Marnie From Laynie East ECT AM To Marnie NRON cc Subject Re ESchedule Responsibilities Marnie How do you want to handle the review of companies C and L since Im not in the Houston office If you would like I can get someone here to review them Laynie Marnie NRON AM To Susan nron Kevin CT Brian nron Laynie CT Lisa CT Lisa nron Rosalyn nron Stacy NRON Tammy CT cc Subject ESchedule Responsibilities Hi All Attached is the Q ESchedule Responsibility List There have been a few changes from Q due to new companies and staffing changes so please review the attached list carefully If you have any questions or concerns please let me know As a reminder please have these completed schedules to me by Friday morning Obviously the earlier I get them the better off I am so if you can get them to me earlier than that I would appreciate it Thanks Marnie
